website_summaries.verdict: The Drive 4 Low is a decent performance shoe from Under Armour. It is light and comfortable, and it is loved by many because of its amazing aesthetics. There are blistering complaints and issues regarding the material, but these are matters that can easily be addressed by properly breaking the shoe in.
pros: At least a couple of reviewers choose the Under Armour Drive 4 Low over the original high-top version
A good number of buyers say that these low-top Under Armour basketball shoes are light and comfortable
The same can be said about the Nike PG 3
Many purchasers are saying that the UA Drive 4 Low looks great
Some players are saying that like the HOVR Havoc, this shoe grips the floor well
cons: At least one reviewer says that the UA Drive Low causes blisters
One reviewer did not feel that the mesh upper works as expected
Some commenters are claiming that these low-top basketball shoes run small

customer_reviews.title: Ok so far..
customer_reviews.text: I wear a wize 9-9.5 depending on the brand. I have another pair of under armour shoes that are a size 9.5.Some reviews said they are a little small so I went up a size. the 10 is a little 2 big, but even a 9.5 would have been too small so its more like a 9 3/4 would have fit. anyway, they seem to feel ok despite being a little 2 big. I'll update my review once I've worn these for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: C.L

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Fit my son great!!! He really likes them! Size was good, width was correct, and really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Only girl in the house!!!

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are very uncomfortable my son unfortunately wore them a whole day at school so I couldn't return them. He has had lots of UA shoes so he just put them on and went there is sharp hard plastic at the top of them that dig into his ankle they are terrible worst pair of shoes he says he has every had
customer_reviews.author: Arrick70

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes, play basketball and they are light weight and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Joel Vetter

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: From a performance standpoint this shoe is very light weight and sleek. Unfortunately, the heel cushion isn’t very responsive it had literally no impact protection which resulted in many heel injuries that’s never happen to me in any other shoe in my 10 years of playing basketball. For 40 dollars it’s a good price but not a good shoe If you want to keep your achilles tendon.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Piedra

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide footers!
customer_reviews.text: The good: This shoe is excellent for wide footers. It has good traction too. The outsole is thick so it is great for outdoor courts. Low to the ground, awesome if you value court feel. Great price too! The bad: the cushioning on the forefoot is non existent. I do not recommend this for bigger players.
customer_reviews.author: firstlast

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoes for outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a good quality shoes. I have been using it for almost a year. No complaints so far. It provides a good grip, fits perfectly, looks good on jeans and shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These run small. Order one size larger than you think you need.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 11.5 or 12. The 12 is WAY too small for me. I’m exchanging for a 13.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the right material
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t like the material which hurts my skin, not sure these really design for basketball !!
customer_reviews.author: Wildcats

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and fits good. Bought it for my bf cuz he loves sports and always wears these.
customer_reviews.author: LuCy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old son has huge feet. I ordered these 1/2 size up from the shoes I bought him 6 months ago. They fit great with a little room to grow through basketball season.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J G

customer_reviews.title: Fair shoes for its price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a low top basketball shoes, so it doesn’t give much ankle support, but the shoes fit it’s way. The sole is harder than expected, but it definitely worthy with its price. The rubber sole fits outside courts, don’t recommend those who has big weight, but for small fr, point guard are recommended, it’s good for its price, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my bf. He loves them and said they are very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hale

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for 10.5 wide feet. Liked design, but had to return
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: nice looking shoe, runs super small, go up a size
customer_reviews.author: robert marbury

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was insanely hard to get on. I know I have wide feet but I have never had this much struggle to get the shoe on, and then once it was on the shoe feels really weird on.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J

customer_reviews.title: No too comfy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great looking however they are somewhat tight and not really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David Karren

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: They fit a tad snug width wise BUT It’s been good for my wide flat feet. Very comfortable and I love the look. Seem durable so far as well.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and for the most part fits good to.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect! I prefer these over high tops for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Trae

customer_reviews.title: I like very much Under Armour shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly heavy but very comfortable. My son is wearing them whole day...
customer_reviews.author: Armen I.

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put on and the material near the ankle feels like cardboard not cushiony. Not the best design. Threw away the packaging so I didn’t return them . My son doesnt like how they feel.
customer_reviews.author: DI

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit perfectly and is durable. Takes a few wears to get broken in well but very comfortable and lightweight. Much better quality than Nike low-top basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: My big toe feels like its being amputated when I wore this. Its too painful to wear. Unfortunately I threw the box so I had to throw away this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The traction is great, rubber sole is very durable and its great for outdoor ballers.
customer_reviews.author: Rossy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I play basketball daily and these shoes have held up and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Reese

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes. Not let down in any aspect honestly, I'd make this purchase again
customer_reviews.author: L.mike97

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Came just as expected and looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Size suggestion
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit... Needed an 11.5 instead of 11 Prime return and reorder worked well
customer_reviews.author: w  osullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes not only for basketball!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design, as always, and maximum comfort! great for autumn and winter!
customer_reviews.author: Mamuka Nemsadze

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. However, they gave me a blister walking around the house. Once tightened down it cuts underneath the ankle bone. The mesh used makes zero sense. I'm hoping that once broken in the issue will resolve. Until then I'm forced to wear 2 socks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Drive 4 Low Basketball Shoes, Men's Men's Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: Lightweight mesh upper with TPU coating for durability The side panels with Antifoam technology offer a mapped fit on the body, a light structure and optimal support External counter for greater support and stability of the back of the foot The layer that wraps the toe increases the length of the forefoot Reinforced and durable lacing eyelets Die-cut EVA midsole provides cushioning and support for the sole of the foot EVA melded compression sole for lateral containment The visible Micro G heel offers effective cushioning The 3D rail encloses the walls to provide a flexible platform and greater lateral stability The integral herringbone pattern in rubber ensures maximum control and excellent grip on the ground Weight: 350 g
feature_bullets: The side panels with Antifoam technology offer a mapped fit on the body, a light structure and optimal support
External counter for greater support and stability of the back of the foot
The layer that wraps the toe increases the length of the forefoot
Die-cut EVA midsole provides cushioning and support for the sole of the foot
